function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of data quality and accuracy due to complex sensing environments and variances in indoor environments","Impact":"Inaccurate data may lead to incorrect assessments of indoor environmental quality and building performance","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of sensing devices, and statistical analysis methods to account for variance","Technologies":"Sensing devices with self-calibration capabilities, machine learning algorithms for data analysis","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and data analysts","Owner":"Facility management and data analytics teams"},{"Description":"Risk of inadequate data representation and insight generation from IEQ measurements","Impact":"Inability to accurately represent indoor environmental conditions and generate useful insights for building performance","Mitigation":"Conducting research on longitudinal IEQ measurements, developing novel data analysis methods, and enhancing data synthesis techniques","Technologies":"Longitudinal sensing devices, big data analytics tools, data synthesis algorithms","People":"Building and environmental researchers, data scientists, and facility managers","Owner":"Building and environmental research teams"}]}
